text:
🥃 SUNDAY BOURBON SALE 🥃

Make it a smooth Sunday! Premium bourbon selection on special today. From classic favorites to rare finds - perfect for sipping or gifting.

🌟 Maker's Mark
🌟 Woodford Reserve
🌟 Four Roses
🌟 Wild Turkey
🌟 Jim Beam Black

Visit Legacy Wine & Liquor in Downtown Sanford today!

📍 Open Sunday | Downtown Sanford, FL
